Description_lang: Increases the damage dealt by your Hammer of Wrath ability by $s1%.

description_blz.en_US: Increases the damage dealt by your Hammer of Wrath ability by 10%.
description_blz.es_MX: Aumenta un 10% el daño infligido con tu facultad Martillo de cólera.
description_blz.pt_BR: Aumenta em 10% o dano causado pela sua habilidade Martelo da Ira.
description_blz.de_DE: Erhöht den verursachten Schaden Eures Zaubers 'Hammer des Zorns' um 10%.
description_blz.en_GB: Increases the damage dealt by your Hammer of Wrath ability by 10%.
description_blz.es_ES: Aumenta un 10% el daño infligido con tu facultad Martillo de cólera.
description_blz.fr_FR: Augmente de 10% les points de dégâts infligés par votre technique Marteau de courroux.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta i danni inflitti da Martello dell'Ira del 10%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Увеличивает урон, наносимый заклинанием "Молот гнева", на 10%.
description_blz.zh_TW: 使你憤怒之錘所造成的傷害提高10%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 使你的愤怒之锤所造成的伤害提高10%。
